Interface ResourceIO<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
ResourceReader<T>, ResourceWriter<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractResourceReader, AbstractResourceWriter, ChemistryDataReader, CrossRef, CSVTimeSeriesReader, DrugBankReader, ElevationReader, ETOPOElevationReader, FactbookReader, FASTAParser, FASTAReader, FASTAWriter, FASTQParser, FbxMeshReader, FinancialMarketReader, GBIFTaxonomy, GeoJSONReader, GoogleElevationReader, HorizonsEphemerisReader, ICD10Reader, NASAExoplanetsReader, NCBITaxonomy, NCBITaxonomyReader, NMEAReader, ObjMeshReader, OpenWeatherReader, PDBReader, PDBWriter, PeriodicTableReader, SIMBADReader, SRTMElevationReader, StarReader, StlMeshReader, UniProtReader, VirusReader, VizieRReader, VTKWriter, WorldBankReader
public interface ResourceIO<T>
Common interface for all resource I/O components in JScience. Replaces the old ResourceLoader.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
